get.description:
Get a list of Lianlian Pay system generated events. If no events, empty list will be returned

Return type is List<`Event`>

parameters.name: topic
parameters.description: Event topic defined in Lianlian Pay's system.

parameters.name: pageNum
parameters.description: If nonzero, skip this number of results before returning data. Used with `pageSize` to provide pagination for large datasets.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: If nonzero, return no more than this number of results. Used with `pageNum` to provide pagination for large datasets. Unless otherwise specified, the maximum number of records that can be returned from an API call is 20 records

get.description:
Get a Lianlian Pay system generated event by `eventId`

Return type is `Event` object

event.title: Event
event.description: Event object generated during business processing in Lianlian Pay's system.

id.description: Event id in Lianlian Pay's system

type.description:
Object type related to this event. One of:

| type | description |
|------|-------------|
| profile | Profile object defined in Lianlian Pay's system. Get profile details by requesting `Get Profile` API|
| bill | Bill object defined in Lianlina Pay's system. Get bill details by requesting `Get Bill` API|
| account | Account object defined in Lianlina Pay's system. Get bill details by requesting `Get Account` API|
| document | Document stored in Lianlina Pay's system. Get document file by requesting `Download Document` API|

event-topic-enum.title: Event Topic Enumeration
event-topic-enum.description:
Event topics defined in Lianlian Pay's system.

| Topic | Description |
|--------|------------|
| account.paymentaccount.created | Payment account created in Lianlian Pay system. Return data `Account` object. |
| bill.funded | Bill fully funded, `Bill.isFullyFunded` equals `true`. Return data `Bill` object.  |
| bill.paid | Bill paid, after receiving payment request(Submit Bill), Lianlian Pay made payment to bill payee. `Bill.ispaid` equals `false`. Return data `Bill` object. |
| bill.canceled | After receiving void bill request, Lianlian Pay canceled the bill. Return data `Bill` object. |
| bill.expired | No funding or short funding after bill expiration date. Return data `Bill` object. |
| profile.failed | Profile KYC failed, Lianlian Pay cannot provide service to this profile. Return data `Profile` object. |
| profile.active | Profile KYC passed, profile active in Lianlian Pay system. Return data `Profile` object.  |
| profile.error | Profile KYC error, need more information to complete Lianlian Pay KYC. Detailed information can be found in `Profile.feedback`. Return type `Profile` object.  |
| profile.rar.complete | Profile KYC Risk Assessment Report complete. Return data `Document` object  |
